snippet: The government is investigating new accusations, related to a child abuse scandal in north Wales in the 1970s and 1980s, that could involve a political figure.
abstract: British government says it is investigating new accusations related to child abuse scandal in children's homes, foster homes and other care facilities in north Wales in 1970s and 1980s.
lead_paragraph: The government is investigating new accusations, related to a child abuse scandal in north Wales in the 1970s and 1980s, that could involve a political figure.
